TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TableCellControlBuilder extends System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder

Docs.summary: Interacts with the parser to build a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The TableCellControlBuilder class is used primarily by control developers. To create a custom control builder for a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> class, you must inherit from this class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool AllowWhitespaceLiterals() cil managed

Docs.summary: Specifies whether white space literals are allowed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The AllowWhitespaceLiterals method overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to ignore white space in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> control.
